Executes the attack operation between the attacker and target cards.
execute(TaskStatus) - Method in class Commands.AttackPlayerCommand
Executes the attack command, applying damage calculations based on the selected card, updating player health, and handling card lifecycle events such as spell usage or weapon attacks.

Executes the command to draw a card from the deck and update the hand display based on the current task status.
